name: get_chapter_details_by_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bhagavad_gita_v3.
Tool description: This is api for the Bhagavad Gita book. A Hindu scripture.
API description: Fetch details of a Bhagavad Gita chapter by its ID using the provided RapidAPI key.

chapterid.description: The ID of the Bhagavad Gita chapter to fetch details for.
